website_summaries.verdict: One of the more popular gym chalks available for online purchase, this quality product is sure to impress.
pros: Comes in a 1-pound pack, but available in other sizes
A purchase can last for years
Brittle construction can easily be turned into powder
cons: A few customers thought the chalk was too fine while a few others had issues with shipping

customer_reviews.title: What am I going to do with all of this ...
customer_reviews.text: What am I going to do with all of this chalk? I bought this 3 years ago and have just finished off the first block even after using it 3-4 workouts per week. I'm calling my lawyer now so that I can make provisions in my will for the remainder of the box. EDIT SUMMER 2017: Good God! It's been 6 years and I still have half the box left! They are going to bury me in gym chalk!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.E

customer_reviews.title: This Has a great shelf life
customer_reviews.text: This Has a great shelf life. I use this religiously while in the gym. I don't really suffer from sweaty palms but I personally like that Locked On Grip with benching. Its a must for me while benching anything over 225Lbs, I need that secure feeling the chalk will provide. I bought this back in 2012, and just recently found an unused chalk cube that I've put into rotation in my gym bag. The only thing I can say negative about the product is it'll kinda make of mess around the gym. But if your like me, who doesn't care; than rock on and hit them Gains Bruh.!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Set for life
customer_reviews.text: Got this for lifting and I am almost certain this is enough chalk for myself, friends, and family, for the next 500 years. Good stuff. Makes my sweaty meaty hands grippy like a geico. Also don’t rip the bag open too hard or else your lungs will fill with this and pull more weight then you ever will.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to break into pieces
customer_reviews.text: Well...... As chalk, it is good and works prefect. The only reason I give 4 stars is it is too easy to break into pieces. It comes with cube shape. But when I opened the paper bag, it totally broke into many many small pieces. I know, it finally goes into powder, however, the big piece is easy to carry, that is why I purchase a cube shape. But.............hmmmmmm........ Also, i purchased other brands gym chalk cube, they are much tougher which made me use it longer.
customer_reviews.author: PolymanQ

customer_reviews.title: Not what is used to be!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several years ago and it was excellent chalk. I just bought it again, retuned it and got a replacement and retuned that too. The chalk is made in China and it is absolute trash. Every single block was broken into powder. The powder seems to make everything slippery as opposed to increase your grip. I train kettlebells and rock climb. I’ve used a lot of chalk. Do not buy this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Old, water damage, moldy
customer_reviews.text: The box came with what looks like significant water damage. There are spots on the outside and inside of the box that look like mold! The paper around the chalk blocks also looks like it has water damage and mold spots. The box practically fell apart when I opened it. The chalk also has a really nasty smell to it, like chalk mixed with mold. Not sure if this box was just an old one, or if there is a whole shipment that got damaged. Either way, you might want to think twice about buying this!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Very fine, a bit slick. (Used for climbing)
customer_reviews.text: I've bought block chalk by the pound for over a decade. It has always been sufficient, maybe not scented or packaged fancy, but a good product. This batch is different. It's extremely fine which causes a bit of slickness. I wouldn't say that it has caused me to fall off of anything and it's certainly better than no chalk at all, but it's below average even for a basic block chalk. Since I have a full pound of it, I'll go ahead and use it. I've found that blowing on or clapping my hands before a climb to get rid of excess chalk does the trick. Next time I'll buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: H Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality Chalk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chalk thinking I was getting a lot of it for a steal, but the old proverb of quality over quantity holds true. I didn't suffer the mold on the packaging that other customers experienced, but I was very disappointed at how brittle this chalk was. It was almost like baby powder or flour, and it did not stick to my hands well enough to last one set of deadlifts. I do not recommend this product, consider using your money to purchase high quality chalk at a lower volume.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto Sin

customer_reviews.title: I use for Rock climbing
customer_reviews.text: I use for rock climbing at the gym and outdoors. Cleave in the middle against a counter. Usually you'll get 2 large pieces and some crumbly bits. The blocks work way better then the powdered. I rub it on my hands almost like "painting" it on and it will stick instead of fall off like some of the powders. Yes, it is a lot of chalk but it's not like it goes bad. I have gone through 1 pound in a year-although I have given about 4 blocks to friends(who also like this chalk)
customer_reviews.author: eridon2002

customer_reviews.title: Smells like mildew and it’s moldy
customer_reviews.text: All of this chalk came moldy and smelled like mildew. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffdog

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended for Climbers - Slick Chalk
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend against using this chalk for climbing. The chalk immediately fell apart into dust and was actually slick on holds, especially slopers. The last thing I want to worry about while climbing is if my chalk is going to make me slip off a hold. I immediately ordered a new brand of chalk and will dump my chalk bag to stop having to use this terrible excuse for chalk as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible condition
customer_reviews.text: Moldy box. I don't know why this was sent to me in this condition. I am worried that I breathed in some of the mold. Dust was everywhere when I opened the amazon box and covering everything inside my box.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Climbers - Spend the extra 2 dollars elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This chalk was nearly the end of me. Put a whole new chunk of this chalk in my chalk bag... went out for a warm evening climb at the owen’s Gorge in bishop... and this chalk was worthless! I my hand slipped off numerous times while trying to clip on the first bolt. Then fell to my demise. Ended up having to borrow someone else’s chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Mhobbs

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price and it will last you a long time
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this chalk for around a year now. This is a great price and it will last you a long time. Update: It's been another year. I've been using this chalk for two years now. I'm pretty liberal with the amount of chalk I use but I do use it for most of my lifts since I have a sweat problem :). Just to give you an idea, I go to the gym 5-6 times a week so this chalk is going to go a long way. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: All gym chalk is not the same. This chalk hardly works and my gym members hate it. Worse than that.. amazon... the packaging. My box literally looked like someone punted it across the warehouse. Every single brick of chalk was smashed into pebbles or powder. And like i said worse than that the chalk is too fine and doesnt rub off on your hands well. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: cassiusclaynyc

customer_reviews.title: and it is AWESOME! I pretty much only really use it for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first chalk I have ever used, and it is AWESOME! I pretty much only really use it for my deadlifts because that is the only place where I felt like I really needed something, and I prefer to not use gloves. My deadlift immediately went up about 30 pounds or so the first time I used this chalk. When I put this chalk on my hands I can grab the bar with a death grip. I highly recommend this chalk to anyone wanting to keep their hands dry especially for deadlifts or any pulling exercise for that matter. This box comes with a lot of chalk that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Almost all gym chalk is the same.
customer_reviews.text: I own a CrossFit gym and have purchased all kinds of chalk. As far as I can tell, they are all the same and work great as long as the athletes know how to use it. Search "chalk this one up YouTube" to see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: JTW

customer_reviews.title: too soft Breaks apart
customer_reviews.text: We ordered it for our barbell club. The chalk fell apart right away and was almost too powdery. Almost like baby powder. We have ordered this in the past and didn't have this experience a few years ago, but wasn't a good fit for us this time around. My lifters were not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sawaya

customer_reviews.title: Considerable drop in quality recently
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product several times in the past, however the last two boxes of chalk I've bought have be n absolutely terrible. The first box arrived completely crumbled and the chalk was incredibly dry and brittle. The box I bought to replace it was soft and felt almost like it'd been wet for a while with some black colored substance (possibly mold) all over the inside of the packaging. The first few times I'd ordered this chalk it was great, but the quality has dropped significantly recently. Very dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out
customer_reviews.text: This chalk is the real deal, has helped me a lot with my grip when deadlifting, benching and doing wide pull ups mainly. My brother also likes this as he is learning how to properly get a grip and not compromise his lift. Get this and you will see the change in your gripping game!
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I mean, what can you really say about chalk? It's chalk and it keeps our hands dry and our grips strong at the gym. This is as good as any I've used in my 44 years at the gym. There you have it. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but used to be better
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this chalk. I loved the consistency the first time, but this batch seems much drier. Also it came with clothing and one of the bricks had broken ... white powder was everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Usually good, but this box was wet and moldy!
customer_reviews.text: Chalk and box are horribly moldy with black mold. Chalk is wet and moldy, quite disguisting!!! Shipping box was not wet, so obviously this box had been sitting somewhere and gotten wet and moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Three Years of Chalk, My Friends.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack almost exactly three years ago. I have used chalk for every single workout (unfortunately have had a few spilling accidents as well) three times a week for three whole years, and I am *just* about to run out from my last block of chalk. I keep the crushed chalk inside a Ziploc bag inside another Ziploc bag, since I've found this to be the most efficient storage method. Three years for 25-something dollars is a pretty damn good deal. Forget about gloves -- real lifters use chalk. Buying another pack soon for another three years of gains!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Smashed not, broken in 3rds but smashed
customer_reviews.text: Buying this for years. Today’s package showed up 5lbs all smashed. UPS box zero damage Zero damage to inner boxes, but when opening each pack it’s smashed? Had to use for my gym members today so unable to return. Big mess
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D King

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Quantity for a LOW PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Though this was not a personal purchase, the person I bought it for had nothing but great things to say about this product. This chalk came conveniently packaged and provided the results desired. It has been a couple of months since this chalk has been used almost daily and there is still a lot left. If you are looking for quality gym chalk that will get the job done at a low price, this is the product for you! This will be a definite repurchase without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia

customer_reviews.title: INCREASES TESTOSTERONE LEVELS AND GAINZ
customer_reviews.text: Chalk is a must need for any gym goers! Bodybuilders & powerlifters. Or anyone that does ton of deadlifts! After using chalk from a friend of mine, i finally decided to invest in some chalk. I swear to God chalk increases your grip strength to beyond. You will hit PRs and do increased weight with this! I use this for grip during deadlifts and benching (bar or dumbbells) mainly. There are 8 blocks of chalk. Im still on my first block. My container looks filled still! This is a must have! Srs
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Superb Grip!
customer_reviews.text: This chalk is great. I used to use rock climbing chalk for doing dead lifts and it worked ok. At the time, I thought all chalk was created equal but boy was I wrong. This stuff is amazing for gripping the bar and works far better than the old loose powder rock climbing chalk I used to have. Great product I highly recommend, just make sure you know how much you are ordering because 1 pound of this stuff is easily 2 or 3 years supply for me lol
customer_reviews.author: Logan Shiffler

customer_reviews.title: Ideal chalk for the trash.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for some amazing chalk that will give you strongman strength grip, keep scrolling. I've been lifting seriously for about 4 years so I've handled a bit of chalk. This stuff is trash. It feels almost gritty on your hands, doesn't absorb moisture, and needs to be reapplied every single set. It just crumples and turns to dust when you touch it. Do yourself a favor and grind up sidewalk chalk instead; it would work better than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Works great for lifting!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Definitely helped with my deadlifts. It also helps to learn how to do the lift properly but the chalk definitely is part of doing the lift properly.
customer_reviews.author: Wonky Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick well to hands.
customer_reviews.text: About my least favorite chalk I have ever purchased. I own a gym so we go through couple pounds a month. This will be the last time I ever buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chalk
customer_reviews.text: For everyone complaining about it breaking, keep in mind it's gymnastics, climbing, and weight lifting chalk not classroom writing chalk. It's supposed to break apart. I've used this chalk for all the sports mention and this chalk is soft to the break and covers nicely. I've had some other chalk that feels like sand and personally I feel this far exceeds that of other chalk I've used. It is a lot but we'll worth the price. Definitely a thumbs up for over all performance and experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: So lush.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chalk!! I use it for asmr! It’s so soft and fluffy. 🤤🤤 the only bad part is most of the blocks always arrive broken. Not that I fully mind. Just sucks when I want a whole block.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These breaks apart as soon as you try it get it out of the wrapper! In all of them! I thought was just maybe one but its to all and its not the same as what they use in the gym
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: use for climbing. much cheaper than the stuff they sell at the gym, works just a well for me. prices fluctuate a fair amount, so put it in your cart and see what it does, but under $10 for a pound is a deal.
customer_reviews.author: some user

customer_reviews.title: Son's fav
customer_reviews.text: All 4 of my sons rockclimb but my 17 year-old has actually made a reputation for himself. He climbs competitively, in the gym and outside. This is one of his favorite chalks, prefers it to loose chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Chalk not soft
customer_reviews.text: Chalk does not dissolve soft on ur hands. It's really hard to get it on ur hands... The chalk also breaks easily 😕 But... It kinda works. Just gotta press hard a few times
customer_reviews.author: Valisha Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Again!
customer_reviews.text: Very basic and straight forward product. Packaging came very well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Andres corredor

customer_reviews.title: Honestly worse than bare hands
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find the brand of chalk I usually buy so I figured what the heck its chalk how different could they be? They can apparently be very different. This chalk is useless. Almost none of it stays on your hands after application and the little that does may as well be a lubricant. 10/10 would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Turns to dust
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received a bad batch, every block crumbled immediately after unwrapping. Went through all the blocks in one week.
customer_reviews.author: B and D

customer_reviews.title: Breaks apart pretty quick but works great
customer_reviews.text: Breaks apart pretty quick but works great. I just have a block in a ziplock baggie in my gym bag. I haven't had to use straps on my heavy deadlifts since I got this except for my really high rep sets. I have to re-apply every few sets but that is likely because I just put a little on at a time because I am at a place that wouldn't appreciate chalk everywhere. Also it does not get clumpy or messy as I am sweating.
customer_reviews.author: ogre

customer_reviews.title: ASMR Purposes
customer_reviews.text: Bsn is an asmr favorite. Most of the time is comes already crumbled but you could get lucky sometimes. Its gritty and crunchy. The powder is very fine but its great for reforms. Bsn is one of my favorites although its bipolar. Sometimes it could be hard and gritty other times it melts like butter in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chalk
customer_reviews.text: These chalks are just as good as the ones provided in Gold's Gym, maybe even better. I purchased them for my home gym use. My hands naturally sweat more than a normal person and these chalks help to eliminate that problem during my workouts. I used to use baby powders at home (b/c they care cheaper) but the chalks last much longer and give a much better grip than the baby powders. Currently, I use them mainly for my grip workouts, especially on the tougher IronMind grippers. The box comes with 8 chalk blocks and they will last a very long time. I've been using them for 2 months and I'm still on my first block.
customer_reviews.author: Aron Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for rock climbing.
customer_reviews.text: This chalk is not suitable for climbing. It forms a very fine dry powder that does not stick well to hands and can make the rock seem slicker.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: in love
customer_reviews.text: So crumbly and godly. Works perfect for crumbling and powder play
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Good gym chalk
customer_reviews.text: Building out a home gym, and needed some chalk. This seems adequately chalky, and should do the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A bit moldy
customer_reviews.text: Value for the amount paid is good, however there’s mold inside the box and seeping onto the blocks. I’d already ordered another before I Received this one, and hope it’s not the same it’s coming this Friday the 5/22nd
customer_reviews.author: J.S

customer_reviews.title: Good Chalk
customer_reviews.text: The chalk arrived all broken up! But I would’ve been broken it up anyway... it serves its purpose, in my gymnastics center! :))
customer_reviews.author: GYMJAMMIN'

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst chalk I’ve ever bought and used period. I mean I opened 4 of the 8 pieces and they crumbled and literally useless. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: alona m.

customer_reviews.title: My wife got me this and it's perfect! It really locks your hands to the bar ...
customer_reviews.text: I had just gotten to the point in deadlifts that even with mixed grip, my grip was starting to be the limiting factor in how much I could lift. My wife got me this and it's perfect! It really locks your hands to the bar for a solid grip. It's a pretty large quantity of the stuff too. I think it'll last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: KerouacBean

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and VERY effective.
customer_reviews.text: My deadlift had gotten to the point that "grip it and rip it" was no longer cutting it, thanks to my grip slipping/rolling out. This chalk was a VERY good way to help with that problem. One block broken up makes a surprising amount of chalk and should last a long time. The only con I've noticed with it is that it dries out your hands like you wouldn't believe. (Which IS kind of the point.) Have some lotion or something handy for after workouts and you'll be fine, though.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality chalk ripoff thin and does'nt hold grip--don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Either I received a knock off or the company changed their product. The chalk I received is extremely poor quality, brittle and breaks apart easily. I think this is a CHina ripoff of the previous decent exercise chalk. Avoid at all costs and disregard previous good reviews and they aren't accurate to the current crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Such a Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Ive used only 1 block of Chalk in a ziplock bag for months now lifting almost every day..... and its still got plenty in there! You will prolly never use the whole box of them! Unless....... you're one of those Gym idiots who doesnt know how to actually chalk their hands by making a huge mess of chalk everywhere wasting it..... Throw a block in a big ziplock bag and put it in your GYM BAG! I love this Chalk!!! Great Deal!
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: It'll probably be a while until i buy these. There's so much for just one person.
customer_reviews.author: Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in my last order of bsn gymchalk this was my favorite gymchalk it’s never let me down I saw the price drop so I bought 2 boxes right away only to receive something so different from the normal amazing quality all 2 box’s were completely crumbled it was just powder and dust no full blocks whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: christopher newton

customer_reviews.title: Gymnasts DON’T buy
customer_reviews.text: This chalk crumbles so easily. My gymnasts can’t even use it to chalk up their grips. We got out a new block, excited for new chalk, only to be greatly disappointed when the block crumbled with the slightest amount of pressure. If you want powdered chalk, then this works, but if you are a gymnast and need chalk for grips, avoid this!
customer_reviews.author: Nate W.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to spend $12 on chalk, especially on so much of it--I'm ocd when it comes to trying many different things first before buying in bulk, but I have no regrets here. The blocks are sturdy enough to not make a mess, and fragile enough that the chalk easily rubs into your palms. Three weeks of using this four times a week, and I can tell that my first block of eight from the package will probably last me six months, at least.
customer_reviews.author: cha_maco

customer_reviews.title: this chalk feels weird. it's somehow silkier than other ...
customer_reviews.text: this chalk feels weird. it's somehow silkier than other gym chalk i've used in the past. it still gets the job done, but my hands feel a bit less grippy than i'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: Blub

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase! An entire pound (16 oz
customer_reviews.text: Great Purchase! An entire pound (16 oz.) of chalk conveniently wrapped in 2 oz blocks for just $9.43... Get it while it last this will easily last me at least one full year, and i'm defiantly going to buy more before they run out of product. (they use to sell this same chalk at one lb for $43 fyi!)
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: So much chalk for so little dough
customer_reviews.text: It's true that without chalk nobody would be able to climb above grade 3 on the YDS. Sometimes I chalk up with my GSC Gym Chalk just to get up the staircase at my apartment complex. Heck, you should probably chalk up before driving your car or making breakfast too! The only downside with solid bricks of chalk is that you have to break them up yourself, but that's just practice for climbing your next big project right??
customer_reviews.author: J. Ogasian

customer_reviews.title: So...much...chalk...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize how much chalk is in 1 lb. I grind this stuff up, mix with rubbing alcohol, and use it once per week for deadlifts. So far about 1/10 of one block has lasted me over two months and it will probably last at least two more. If I keep using it at this rate, the whole package will last over 26 years. I imagine a gymnast would go through it a lot faster, but this is still several years worth of chalk.
customer_reviews.author: shemperdoodle

customer_reviews.title: affordable replacement for our gym's chalk supply. will buy ...
customer_reviews.text: affordable replacement for our gym's chalk supply. will buy from again, it's tacky, not too dusty, comes in conveniently sized blocks, and seems to last a fair amount of time. I've had other chalks break apart and seem to disappear faster, this stuff lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Bania

customer_reviews.title: Junk chalk
customer_reviews.text: This chalk sucks . I've never had a chalk just crumble into tiny pieces like this before.
customer_reviews.author: cp

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for climbing.
customer_reviews.text: Awful chalk. No Friction!. ends up as a dry lubricant, feels slick and oily. Huge difference between this and Frank Endo, which is reccomended, or any other kind of climbing chalk. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: deezy

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk. Lasts forever.
customer_reviews.text: love this gym chalk. Came with 8 blocks and I've shared with people at my gym. Lasts forever. only wish was that some of them weren't broken when I received them.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ochs

customer_reviews.title: It showed up really fast and in great condition! He has used many different types of ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband to use when he goes to the gym. He has used it ever since it showed up! It showed up really fast and in great condition! He has used many different types of chalk for when he goes to gym, but this is the best by far! When this runs out we will definitely be getting more! He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Azjah Lynn Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This chalk falls apart and doesn't stick to your hands. In fact, it is so dusty that I could feel myself breathing in chalk dust as I was doing kettlebell swings. I thought maybe I had one bad block, so I tested another and found the same thing. I am throwing away the rest of the box, as it is unusable garbage. Please do yourself a favor and buy the Metolius product (see photo). It doesn't crumble in your hand and keeps your hands dry with no dust.
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: The quantity is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with this chalk is had to be next to gentle , I broke up my block to put it in a container , and hoped some of the broken pieces would be durable. Some were and some weren’t, but I just bought a chalk bag so I can use the chalk to refill my bag. Which I think will last me quite a while
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Good, Affordable Gym Chalk
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described, with many bricks of chalk safely enclosed (and individually wrapped!) in a larger box. The chalk has been working as expected to dry out my hands and improve grip strength on thrown implements (e.g. shot put, discus). The individual chalk bricks are easily broken apart into smaller pieces, but I tend to transport whole bricks in small, reusable plastic containers. I will purchase this product again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Sideleau

customer_reviews.title: A different product than it used to be: slippery!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this brand a few times over the years for climbing. It was great, but the latest batch is terrible. It is superfine, and makes everything feel slippery. It clearly isn’t the same product as before — previously the bricks were packaged in paper, now they’re wrapped in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Hurray chalk!
customer_reviews.text: It's chalk so there's not a lot to say. I liked the priced and the fact that it was in little blocks. They fit well in my chalk bag and break apart easily. Does help while climbing if you have relatively sweaty hands.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I need, and there's a lot of it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works wonders. My hands feel like they are glued to the bar when I use this stuff. Your hands will not slip using this stuff. Won't help you if your grip is weak though. I was very surprised by how much chalk a single block produces. The box has 8 smaller blocks (all wrapped up), and the blocks are about 2" x 2" x 1" (and look like pure cocaine lol), so they aren't that big. That said, one little block produced enough chalk that I needed a 1 gallon ziplock bag to contain it all. it overfilled the quart bags.
customer_reviews.author: gcampaj

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps you grip the bar better but don't over rely on it
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst chalk I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst chalk I have ever had. It immediately crumbles when you unwrap it. This is not gym chalk. We use it at our Crossfit Gym for our hands so they don't slip. The chalk has no consistency and doesn't even stay on your hands. It is not safe for out athletes to us. I would like to return what we have or get a complete refund. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hess

customer_reviews.title: Can't get any better
customer_reviews.text: Great product. 100% magnesium carbonate. Can't get any better than that. For under $10 for 1 pound of chalk, I'd buy it again. Keeps my hands dry when I lift. I have a problem with sweaty hands but this keeps them nice and dry. I like that they come in blocks, however they can be quite fragile. So in this regard it lost one star. Overall would recommend to anyone who lifts
customer_reviews.author: beeunicc

customer_reviews.title: Great quality chalk i am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described! Great quality chalk i am very happy with my purchase! The cubes of chalk are solid and don't break apart easily. I have only used 1 chalk so far. I will update after 1 year and see how good this chalk really is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows what happened to this chalk block once I unwrapped the paper. It crumbled in my hands. It is useless.
customer_reviews.author: DSK

customer_reviews.title: GSC Gym Chalk - 1lb
customer_reviews.text: This product was offered at a great price and delivered in a few days. I powerlift, and the 1 lb quantity chalk will last for a long, long time - I am guessing years. There was a slight delay in delivery, however, because the carrier (I believe it was USPS) ripped the package and then placed it in a plastic page with a apology note attached. Nevertheless, I am very happy with the company who sent the chalk. Sean McKenzie
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Super soft chalk bug stays on during workout. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Emriddle

customer_reviews.title: good deal for bouldering
customer_reviews.text: Rock climbing chalk is getting pricy, this chalk works great for bouldering.
customer_reviews.author: LLonie

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Not too much to say other than it does what it supposed to and it does it great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rod.

customer_reviews.title: Climbers, DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage chalk, feels weird and extremely gritty. Climbers, do not buy this Bought this buy stupid mistake, thinking it was Frank Endo...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wang

customer_reviews.title: best. chalk. ever.
customer_reviews.text: Good old plain unscented block chalk. I use this for rock climbing and I've tried many other chalks but always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and you enjoy a firm grip when at the gym this is the product for you. Unfortunately chalk at the gym is somewhat frowned upon, specifically by the gym staff, just bring along a hand towel and wipe off any extra after your use. I enjoy how it comes in small hand soap sized sections that are individually wrapped. I have a coffee can in my gym bag that I contain my chalk in.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: works great. Chalk is easy to break up and not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to the gym , works great. Chalk is easy to break up and not super dry and chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: And probably best Investment I have done
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this before because I thought 1 LB is not too much.... Also, My plams were killing me after I started doing pull exercises... especially Deadlifts... Once I received the order, I really I am all set for couple of years... And probably best Investment I have done ... Definitely a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Ad. H

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but broken to pieces
customer_reviews.text: I love BSN. So far every. Lock I have received has been great quality but most come broken and some are completely crushed. I love the texture and will continue to order but I would order more if they weren’t always broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but a little more "crumbly" than past purchases
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this before and loved it. This still works quite well; however, it is a little more crumbly than the last pack that I bought. It still works well and gives me a good grip on my barbell and kettlebells. Still, I wish the blocks didn't crumble so easily.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Every one was broken but from what I've been told by other buyers it always happens. Perfect for my son who's learning to box
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not Particularly Pleased..
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had known the blocks would 'disintegrate/crumble' into powder as soon as I took them out of the individual paper wrapper(s). It would likely be less expensive to just purchase it in powder form, or use talc.. WON'T PURCHASE THIS AGAIN.. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Too thin and crumbles
customer_reviews.text: This chalk was not what we hoped. It’s very thin and doesn’t stick to my daughter’s grips. It crumbles too easily which makes it very thin. We will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Ward

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: rly good for ASMR. kind of like ADER but still good
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality chalk. Crumbles apart and doesn’t really leave a good coating on the hands.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a male friend that lifts weights as a bday gift. He loved it. Sink used it my self once. Omg! The grip is unbelievable. I stopped using gloves. My palms tend to get sweaty during workout, this product makes all the difference. (I bought this a while ago and I will self be getting some for my self)
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Utterly messy like most gym chalk but the price can't be beat ...
customer_reviews.text: Utterly messy like most gym chalk but the price can't be beat for the quality and quantity. I gave some of the blocks away to my lifting buddies to help them improve their lifts. ...I pick things up...I put things down.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chalk for climbing
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for years for climbing. Works perfectly. Break the chalk blocks to whatever size that fits your need -- fine for chalking up for a climb or big chunks for marking the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Great for lifting! it's not as "lose"? When crushed up. So it doesn't spread on my hands as easily. But it's no biggie. Still good chalk!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend if you have weak hands
customer_reviews.text: Love how it falls apart in my hands. Sad that it comes broken all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gina De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: ... climber and I can safely say this is the best chalk out there
customer_reviews.text: I am a rock climber and I can safely say this is the best chalk out there. I have tried all of the "climbing" chalks and none compare. All my friends now also exclusively order this chalk to climb with after trying it vs theirs. And to top it off its cheaper than all the competitors!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Parks

customer_reviews.title: Gymnastics Chalk.
customer_reviews.text: The chalk works great, not as dusty as some. Did take longer than i thought to get here, but all is good with the product usage itself. We cannot control shipping! The dates provided are estimates. I just know not to wait to long to reorder. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

product_meta.title: GSC Gym Chalk - 1lb
product_meta.description: The GSC gym chalk can be used for many purposes such as gymnastics or weight lifting. They are wrapped in 2-Ounce blocks for your convenience and each lb. package contains eight blocks.
feature_bullets: For gymnastics or weight lifting. Conveniently wrapped in 2 oz. blocks, eight blocks per 1 lb. package.
For gymnastics or weight lifting. Conveniently wrapped in 2 oz. blocks, eight blocks per 1 lb. package.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
